editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-travelling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp foes without spending any money or you buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

name: Level Devil - NOT A Troll Game

editorialNotes.standard: This breathtaking game mixes tycoon-style park management with electrifying dino-on-dino battles, starring characters and critters from the blockbuster film. We love tinkering with our dinosaur DNA to evolve our thunder lizards into more powerful specimens while also expanding our dream parkâ€™s high-tech facilities. When it comes time to test your dinosaursâ€™ mettle in the arena, strength and strategy are the keys to prehistoric pugilist victories. And luckily, the Indominus rex stays inside her cage. For now.

editorialNotes.standard: Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabamâ€™s beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but youâ€™ll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponentsâ€”and progressing through treacherous story quests.

editorialNotes.standard: We love rediscovering hedgehog history with this enhanced edition of one of Sonicâ€™s greatest adventures. This game sizzles with all the sprawling levels and blazing speed you remember from the â€™90s, but this classic platformer is better than ever on the App Store. With crisp widescreen graphics, tight controls and awesome extra content, itâ€™s just a blast.
Wield the magic of Merlin as you roam stunning landscapes in one of the prettiest idle RPGs weâ€™ve ever played.

editorialNotes.standard: Although this game has a totally different visual style, it feels exactly like Rick and Mortyâ€”thanks to the same hilarious writing thatâ€™s made the Adult Swim series so popular. As you navigate the charactersâ€™ ridiculous worlds, your job is to collect and fight dozens of Mortys from parallel universes. Youâ€™ll find yourself laughing out loud yet constantly captivated by the gameplay. Even if you donâ€™t know a schmeckle from a Meseeks, youâ€™ll delight in the unconventional humor and gripping turn-based combat.
editorialNotes.short: Zip through the multiverse to catch all the Mortys in this personality-packed RPG.
